description: Scrapeless is an all-in-one and highly scalable web scraping toolkit for enterprises and developers.

actions.name: crawl_crawl
actions.description: Crawls a website and its linked pages to extract comprehensive data.

actions.name: crawl_scrape
actions.description: Extracts data from a single webpage.

actions.name: google_search_api
actions.description: Retrieves search result data for any query.

actions.name: google_trends_api
actions.description: Access popular keyword and interest data from Google Trends.

actions.name: universal_scraping_api
actions.description: Seamlessly accesses protected or dynamic pages by handling anti-scraping systems automatically.
